content.question: The researcher hypothesizes that when turtle embryos respond to thermal cues they develop more rapidly than do turtle embryos that do not respond to thermal cues. Describe ONE potential advantage for turtles having a shorter embryonic period.

frqParts.text: The researcher hypothesizes that when turtle embryos respond to thermal cues they develop more rapidly than do turtle embryos that do not respond to thermal cues. Describe ONE potential advantage for turtles having a shorter embryonic period.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
